title: Punjab CM Bhagwant Mann swearing-in ceremony Live updates: CM designate, Arvind Kejriwal arrive at Khatkar Kalan - The Indian Express
content:
1. Punjab CM Bhagwant Mann swearing-in ceremony Live updates: CM designate, Arvind Kejriwal arrive at Khatkar Kalan  The Indian Express
  2. Bhagwant Mann's Swearing-In Ceremony LIVE | Punjab's New Chief Minister | India Today LIVE  India Today
  3. At Bhagat Singh's Village, Bhagwant Mann And "Rang De Basanti"  NDTV
  4. Punjab CM swearing-in LIVE updates: Bhagwant Mann sworn in as chief minister  Hindustan Times
  5. Bhagwant Mann swearing-in: ‘He was always in my prayers, will always be..,’ says ex-wife; children reach India to attend ceremony  The Indian Express
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Bhagwant Mann swearing-in ceremony LIVE News, Punjab CM Bhagwant Mann swearing-in ceremony: The MLAs will be administered oath during Vidhan Sabha session on Thursday, while Mann’s cabinet will take oath Saturday at the Punjab Raj Bhawan.
